original_title: Megafactories Super Cars: Tesla Model S
overview: Mankind has long relied on the internal combustion engine for transportation. Now, with fossil fuels becoming increasingly sparse one company is trying to change the way we commute; this is the story behind the world's first fully electric premium sedan - the Tesla Model S. Tesla's electrical experts in Fremont, CA are gearing up for mass production in a groundbreaking new Mega Factory - but will the Model S take the world by storm?
title: Megafactories Super Cars: Tesla Model S
